visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render an organization chart with the following specifications: Chart type: Organization. Chart title: 'Organization Chart: Different type of links'. Axes and labels styling: Use a font size of 14px for all text elements, and set the color of the title to #333333. Data series: Include data for nodes 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D', and 'E', with links from 'A' to 'B', 'B' to 'C', 'B' to 'E' with a curved link, and 'A' to 'D'. Custom colors: Use #0073e6 for all nodes. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to #f9f9f9, enable exporting with HTML allowed, and set the source width to 800 and height to 600.

title.text: Organization Chart: Different type of links

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render an organization chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'organization', and the title is styled with a font size of 14px and a color of #333333. The data series includes nodes 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D', and 'E', with links defined between them. The nodes are styled with a radius of 30 and a fill color of #0073e6. The chart background is set to #f9f9f9, and exporting options are enabled with HTML allowed and a source width of 800 and height of 600. This configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing organization chart with the specified customizations.
